resources.string: Hold the device comfortably with one or two hands and \'tap\' the top width of the device against an imaginary object
Hold the device comfortably with one or two hands and pretend to use the edge of the side of the device to cut or chop a stick or vegetable, as with a hatchet

Balance the device on one or two vertically oriented fingers and use your other hand to rotate the device at 2+ rps, as with a ball. Alternately, rest the deviceâ€™s back surface on a flat, hard, surface and using one or two hands, rotate the device on that surface, as like a spinning top. Be sure to avoid damaging the device or anything else
Hold the device comfortably with one or two hands and pretend to pour liquid out of a pot, and return to the start position
